title: Platform Limitation Notice for MQL5 Expert Advisor Request

requirements.summary: Display a clear message explaining that MQL5 Expert Advisors cannot be generated on this platform
acceptanceCriteria: User sees a prominent notice explaining platform limitations
The notice clearly states this platform only supports Motoko backend and React/TypeScript frontend applications
The notice explains that MQL5 Expert Advisors for MetaTrader 5 cannot be generated here
User understands that the Internet Computer does not support MT5 trading integrations or MQL5 code execution

file_operations.description: Add a centered notice component explaining that this platform cannot generate MQL5 Expert Advisors or MetaTrader applications, and that it only supports Motoko backend and React/TypeScript frontend development
Add styling for the platform limitation notice to ensure it is clearly visible and properly formatted
